description:
Enjoying your cold-season training or even your commute. Wind and dipping temps won't faze you, thanks to a windproof and water-resistant outer layer and PrimaLoft® insulation. Silicone grips keep your hands well-positioned on the bars, even when it's damp.

  • Windproof outer fabric sheds gusts and has stretch for comfort
  • PrimaLoft® insulation on back of hand keeps fingers warm
  • Lightly brushed fleece lining holds in body heat
  • Synthetic suede palm has silicone overlays for grip and touchscreen compatible index and thumb
  • Slip-on wrist construction
name: Castelli Entrata Thermal Gloves - Unisex
